mapper.sql: parecord.pa_id as parecord_pa_id, parecord.cg_id as parecord_cg_id, parecord.bi_id as parecord_bi_id, parecord.pa_total as parecord_pa_total, parecord.pa_pel as parecord_pa_pel, parecord.pa_qc as parecord_pa_qc, parecord.pa_date as parecord_pa_date, parecord.pa_mn as parecord_pa_mn, parecord.pa_remark as parecord_pa_remark, parecord.pa_jspopl as parecord_pa_jspopl, parecord.toexamine as parecord_toexamine, parecord.state_id as parecord_state_id
mapper.insert: insert into parecord (cg_id, bi_id, pa_total, pa_pel, pa_qc, pa_date, pa_mn, pa_remark, pa_jspopl, toexamine, state_id) values (#{cgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{biId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paPel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paQc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paMn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paJspopl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toexamine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stateId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update parecord
cg_id = #{cg_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bi_id = #{bi_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pa_total = #{pa_total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pa_pel = #{pa_pel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pa_qc = #{pa_qc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pa_date = #{pa_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pa_mn = #{pa_mn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pa_remark = #{pa_remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pa_jspopl = #{pa_jspopl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toexamine = #{toexamine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state_id = #{state_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where pa_id = #{pa_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update parecord set cg_id = #{cg_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bi_id = #{bi_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pa_total = #{pa_total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pa_pel = #{pa_pel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pa_qc = #{pa_qc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pa_date = #{pa_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pa_mn = #{pa_mn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pa_remark = #{pa_remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pa_jspopl = #{pa_jspopl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toexamine = #{toexamine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state_id = #{state_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pa_id = #{pa_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select parecord.pa_id,parecord.cg_id,parecord.bi_id,parecord.pa_total,parecord.pa_pel,parecord.pa_qc,parecord.pa_date,parecord.pa_mn,parecord.pa_remark,parecord.pa_jspopl,parecord.toexamine,apprecords.app_state from parecord LEFT JOIN apprecords on parecord.state_id=apprecords.app_records_id
